AT.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
AT.description: Folgst den verrückten neuen Abenteuern von Olaf dem Wikinger und seiner Bande in diesem Fantasy-Tower-Defense-Spiel im Cartoon-Stil. Errichte deine Türme an strategischen Stellen, um den Vormarsch der Wikinger aufzuhalten. Um gegen die Langschiffe, Walküren und Gott Odin zu bestehen, rüstest du deine Verteidigung auf, schaltest neue Gebäude frei! Hinweis: Dieses Spiel unterscheidet sich von der Vollversion von Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense und enthält 12 Karten und den Story-Modus.

BG.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
BG.description: After the success of the first game, follow the whacky new adventures of Olaf the Viking and his group in this cartoon-style fantasy Tower Defense. Build your towers at the most strategic locations to block the advance of the Viking units. To counter the drakkars, Valkyries and even the god Odin, unlock new buildings and upgrade your defences! Note: This game differs from the retail version of Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense and contains 12 maps and the Story mode.

BE.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
BE.description: Suivez les nouvelles aventures déjantées d’Olaf le viking et sa bande dans ce tower defense cartoon-fantastique. Construisez vos tours aux endroits les plus stratégiques pour bloquer l’avancée des unités vikings. Pour faire face aux drakkars, valkyries et même au dieu Odin, débloquez de nouveaux bâtiments et améliorez vos défenses ! Note : Ce jeu diffère de la version boîte de Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense, et contient 12 niveaux ainsi que le mode Histoire.

ES.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
ES.description: Sigue las nuevas delirantes aventuras de Olaf el vikingo y su grupo en este juego de Tower Defense de estilo fantástico y animado. Construye tus torres en los puntos más estratégicos para bloquear el avance de las unidades vikingas. Para contrarrestar los drakkars, valquirias e incluso al dios Odín, mejora tus defensas y desbloquea edificios nuevos. Nota: este juego difiere de la versión del juego Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense para las tiendas y tiene 12 mapas, así como el modo Historia.

IT.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
IT.description: Segui le nuove, bizzarre avventure di Olaf il vichingo e il suo gruppo in questo titolo fantasy in stile cartoon del genere tower defense. Costruisci le tue torri nei punti più strategici per bloccare l'avanzata delle unità nemiche. Per contrastare i drakkars, le valchirie e addirittura il dio Odino, aggiorna le tue difese e sblocca nuovi edifici! Nota: questa versione di Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense, contenente 12 mappe e la modalità Storia, è diversa dalla versione destinata alla vendita.

NL.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
NL.description: Volg de knotsgekke nieuwe avonturen van Olaf de Viking en zijn bende in deze cartoonachtige torenverdediging. Bouw je torens op de meest strategische locaties om de oprukkende Vikingeenheden te stoppen. Om weerstand te bieden aan de drakkars, valkyries en zelfs de god Odin, moet je met de verdedigingen verbeteren en nieuwe gebouwen ontgrendelen. Let op: dit spel verschilt van de winkelversie van Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense en bevat 12 kaarten en de verhaalmodus.

PL.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
PL.description: After the success of the first game, follow the whacky new adventures of Olaf the Viking and his group in this cartoon-style fantasy Tower Defense. Build your towers at the most strategic locations to block the advance of the Viking units. To counter the drakkars, Valkyries and even the god Odin, unlock new buildings and upgrade your defences! Note: This game differs from the retail version of Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense and contains 12 maps and the Story mode.

PT.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
PT.description: Depois do sucesso do primeiro jogo, acompanha as novas e arrojadas aventuras de Olaf, o Viking, e o seu grupo, nesta fantasia em estilo banda desenhada Tower Defense. Constrói as tuas torres nas localizações mais estratégicas para travar o avanço dos batalhões Viking. Para combateres os drakkars, as Valkyries e até o Deus Odin, melhora as tuas defesas e desbloqueia novos edifícios. Nota: Este jogo difere da versão original de Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense, contém 12 mapas e modo de história.

RU.name: Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. After the success of the first game, follow the whacky new adventures of Olaf the Viking and his group in this cartoon-style fantasy Tower Defense. Build your towers at the most strategic locations to block the advance of the Viking units. To counter the drakkars, Valkyries and even the god Odin, unlock new buildings and upgrade your defences! Note: This game differs from the retail version of Viking Invasion 2 - Tower Defense and contains 12 maps and the Story mode.
